## Instalaci贸n

## Checksums (Opcional)

Para verificar la integridad de las descargas:

```
SHA256(CLIB Ventas-X.Y.Z-setup.exe) = [hash aqu铆]
SHA256(CLIB Ventas-X.Y.Z-x64.exe) = [hash aqu铆]
```

Para generar los checksums en Windows:
```powershell
Get-FileHash "CLIB Ventas-X.Y.Z-setup.exe" -Algorithm SHA256
Get-FileHash "CLIB Ventas-X.Y.Z-x64.exe" -Algorithm SHA256
```
